meanings.definition: The greatest quantity or value attainable or attainable under given conditions.
meanings.sent1: She reached the maximum number of points in the game.
meanings.sent2: The maximum capacity of the tank is 20 gallons.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored the maximum amount of nuts in its nest.
meanings.sent4: His love for her knew no maximum, it was boundless.
meanings.sent5: The teacher set a maximum limit of two snacks per student.

meanings.sent1: The thermometer showed the maximum temperature for the day.
meanings.sent2: Reaching the maximum altitude, the plane began its descent.
meanings.sent3: The cat reached its maximum cuteness level with a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement reached a maximum when she won the award.
meanings.sent5: The maximum speed of the car was 100 miles per hour.
